caption.center: VESTLE L. ENGLAND, JR., Exceptant Below, Appellant, v. NANCY E. SOCCORSO,

opinion.posture: Court Below: Court of Chancery of the State of Delaware in and for New Castle County, Register of Wills Folio 114375.
opinion.panel: Before WALSH, HOLLAND and BERGER, Justices.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER This 19th day of January, 2001, the Court, having considered this matter on the briefs of the parties, and having concluded that the Court of Chancery correctly applied the standards set forth in DiGiacobbe v.Sestak, Del. Supr., 743 A.2d 180 (1999), and that its Order of January 4, 2000, should be affirmed on the basis of and for reasons assigned in the Order,
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the judgment of the Court of Chancery be, and the same hereby is AFFIRMED.
BY THE COURT:
/s/ Carolyn Berger Justice
